text: God tap suŋtep ne okok, chen okok kɨlop ma ñɨnɨmɨb agak. Pen kubap mɨlep okok, chag yenɨgel wulep sɨŋak ma dɨyokɨnɨmɨb agak. Anɨgɨl genɨgabɨm, kɨli taw pag pakel amek, adɨkɨd apɨl nɨbop sunɨgabal agak. Takaw paladaŋ lɨl agak ak, jɨj ne anɨgɨl mɨdeb, Binɨb God takaw ma nɨgtep gɨpal okok, takaw teplep anɨb ak kɨlop ma agñeb.
